name: The 6th International Symposium on Fundamental and Applied Sciences
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), the 6th International Symposium on Fundamental and Applied Sciences (ISFAS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Agricultural Engineering and Technologies, Computer Technologies, Fundamental Sciences, Geology, earth and environmental sciences, Green technology, Industrial and Manufacturing Technologies, Nanotechnology, Ocean Technologies, Space Technologies, Transportation and beyond. 2018 ISFAS will take place from February 6-8, 2018 in Osaka, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. For more information, please visit: http://isfas.org or contact: isfas@isfas.org
